overview:
Curt Dowdy is one of three co-founders as well as Chief Operating Officer of Matter Network, Inc., an alliance of web content and application publishers that provides news, information and interactive tools to implementers of clean technologies and sustainability practices.

As a former Hewlett-Packard executive, Curt directed business strategies, strategic partnerships, product development and marketing across a range of market-leading products and services. Curt additionally evaluated Internet start-up business teams and plans, making recommendations leading to $20 million in venture funding.

Curt is also a filmmaker and founder of BeLegato Productions, which produced eco-adventure documentary films and co-produced other feature motion picture and documentary projects.
